title: Creating a System of Equations From Relevant Variables
text: Using a to represent the number of pounds of City Roast Columbian and b to represent the number of pounds of French Roast Columbian, we know that $$a+b=20$$ since the total is 20 pounds. Additionally, since we know the 20 pounds cost $7.92 per pound, the total cost is $$20\times7.92=158.4$$. Knowing this total cost, we can get our second equation: $$7.8a+8.1b=158.4$$.

title: How to Use the Systems of Equations
text: Solve the two equations as a normal system of equations to find the values of the two variables.
